Title: Vera Drake
Overview: Abortionist Vera Drake finds her beliefs and practices clash with the mores of 1950s Britain – a conflict that leads to tragedy for her family.
production_companies: Ingenious Film Partners, Les Films Alain Sarde, UK Film Council, Inside Track 1, Thin Man Films, National Lottery through UK Film Council, Inside Track Productions, Film Council Premiere Fund, Untitled 03
Cast: Imelda Staunton, Sally Hawkins, Richard Graham
